arts.ttl: Arsenal transfer news: Mikel Arteta prepares €150m offer for Lautaro Martinez
arts.sum: Arsenal are prepared to pay €150 million to sign Inter Milan forward Lautaro Martinez this summer, according to a bombshell report in Spain. The Argentina international has scored 18 goals in 40 appearances across all competitions so far this season and Arsenal have rekindled their interest in him following rumours of a move to the Emirates Stadium on multiple occasions over the past few years.

arts.ttl: “Life of a striker” — Harry Kane on his big miss in Bayern Munich’s Champions League loss to Inter Milan
arts.sum: Still, it looked a sure goal, the type of chance a striker of Kane’s quality is expected to bury, in the sort of moment a Champions League winning side is expected to conjure. Bayern Munich lost for the first time in 23 Champions League home games on Tuesday against Inter Milan .

arts.ttl: 'Important' Inter win nothing without second leg
arts.sum: Inter Milan's last-gasp 2-1 victory at Bayern Munich in the first leg of their Champions League quarte-final on Tuesday was the result of the Italian team's strong mentality but more work awaits, said Inter coach Simone Inzaghi.

arts.ttl: Inter's Martínez and Thuram could be Inzaghi's X factors in the Champions League
arts.sum: The performances from Inter's Lautaro Martínez and Marcus Thuram could be the deciding factor on how well the Nerazzurri do in the UEFA Champions League.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich 1-2 Inter Milan: Davide Frattesi hits late winner to silence Bavaria
arts.sum: The hosts enjoyed most of the ball but were twice hit against the run of play

arts.ttl: Highlights, report: Inter win late at Bayern
arts.sum: Davide Frattesi's 88th-minute strike gave visitors Inter a 2-1 advantage in their quarter-final against Bayern.
